title: List of all Android material design support  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android material design support  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: android-design-library
repoList.description: Build a Material Design App with the Android Design Support Library

repoList.name: LolliPin
repoList.description: A Material design Android pincode library. Supports Fingerprint.

repoList.name: Genius-Android
repoList.description: Android Material Design Theme UI and Tool Library. Support: 4.0.3~O

repoList.name: android-historian
repoList.description: A demo of the Android Material Design Support libraries

repoList.name: Android-Swipe-Tabs-using-Design-Support-Library-
repoList.description: Android Swipe Tabs using Design Support Library (Material Design)

repoList.name: react-native-android-design-support
repoList.description: [WARNING: NOT MAINTAINED] React Native wrapper for Android Design Support Library, providing Material Design to modern and also older Android devices.

repoList.name: FABsMenu
repoList.description: A simple library to use a menu of FloatingActionButtons from Design Support Library that follow Material Design Guidelines

repoList.name: Scrolling-techniques-using-Android-Design-Support-Library
repoList.description: Como aplicar as técnicas de rolagem do Material Design usando a biblioteca de suporte Android Design Support Library

repoList.name: AndroidMaterialDesign
repoList.description: Features of the new Design Support Library in a sample application - http://www.codeproject.com/Tips/1021308/Android-Material-Design

repoList.name: android-colored-list
repoList.description: This library provides support to generate Google Material Design colored lists.
